sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { publicAPI } from '../services/api'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const PublicDashboard = () => { const [dashboardData, setDashboardData] = useState({ totalReports: 0, totalStudents: 0, totalLecturers: 0, totalCourses: 0, recentActivities: [], facultyStats: [], popularCourses: [] }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { loadPublicData(); }, []); const loadPublicData = async () => { try { const response = await publicAPI.getDashboardData(); setDashboardData(response.data); setError(null); } catch (error) { console.error('Error loading public data:', error); setError('Unable to load dashboard data. Please try again later.'); // Don't set fallback data - let the API handle it } finally { setLoading(false); } }; if (loading) { return (
Loading public dashboard...
); } if (error) { return (

Unable to Load Data

{error}

); } return (
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome to LUCT Reporting System

Limkokwing University of Creative Technology - Lesotho

{dashboardData.totalReports}

Lecture Reports Submitted

{dashboardData.totalStudents}

Students Engaged

{dashboardData.totalLecturers}

Academic Staff

{dashboardData.totalCourses}

Courses Offered

{/* Login/Register Links */}
Login to System Create Account
{/* Main Dashboard Grid */}
{/* Statistics Cards */}

System Overview

📊

{dashboardData.totalReports}

Total Reports

👨‍🎓

{dashboardData.totalStudents}

Registered Students

👨‍🏫

{dashboardData.totalLecturers}

Academic Staff

📚

{dashboardData.totalCourses}

Courses

{/* Faculty Statistics */}

Faculty Performance

{dashboardData.facultyStats && dashboardData.facultyStats.length > 0 ? ( dashboardData.facultyStats.map((faculty, index) => (

{faculty.faculty}

{faculty.reports} Reports
{faculty.students} Students
)) ) : (
No faculty data available
)}
{/* Recent Activities */}

Recent Activities

{dashboardData.recentActivities && dashboardData.recentActivities.length > 0 ? ( dashboardData.recentActivities.map((activity, index) => (
{activity.type === 'report' ? '📝' : '💬'}

{activity.description}

{activity.time}
)) ) : (
No recent activities
)}
{/* Popular Courses */}

Most Active Courses

{dashboardData.popularCourses && dashboardData.popularCourses.length > 0 ? ( dashboardData.popularCourses.map((course, index) => (

{course.name}

{course.code}

{course.reports} reports
)) ) : (
No course data available
)}
{/* System Information */}

About the System

📋 Reporting

Lecturers submit detailed reports of each lecture session with topics covered, attendance, and learning outcomes.

✅ Verification

Student representatives verify and sign completed reports to confirm accuracy of information.

👁️ Monitoring

Principal lecturers monitor and approve teaching activities to ensure quality standards.

💬 Feedback

Comprehensive feedback system for continuous improvement and academic excellence.

{/* Call to Action */}

Ready to Get Started?

Join our academic community and experience streamlined reporting and communication.

Login to System Create Account
); }; export default PublicDashboard;
